pageContext.claim: “But I never forgot when CNN fake news and all these people. They go around interviewing the farmers. They could never find anyone saying bad about Trump. They go into diners, what do you think about Trump? Isn't it terrible what he's doing with the trade? And the farmers would say, no, he's doing what should have been done 20 years ago, right?”
pageContext.analysis: Some farmers are Trump supporters; others have publicly criticized his policies and the chilling effect from his trade war with China on U.S. agricultural exports. China retaliated against Trump's tariffs by cutting imports of U.S. soybeans, porks and other products, dealing a blow to American farmers.
